content:
ITEM NO.23               COURT NO.12               SECTION II-B
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
Petition(s) for Special Leave to Appeal (Crl.)  No(s).  9554/2025
[Arising out of impugned final judgment and order dated  16-06-2025
in BA No. 6875/2025 passed by the High Court of Kerala at 
Ernakulam]
SUMA G.P. & ANR.                                   Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
STATE OF KERALA & ANR.                             Respondent(s)
IA No. 151780/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING C/C OF THE IMPUGNED
JUDGMENT;lIA No. 151784/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.;IA No.
151782/2025  -  PERMISSION  TO  FILE  ADDITIONAL
DOCUMENTS/FACTS/ANNEXURES
 
Date : 07-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM :  HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE PANKAJ MITHAL
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K.V. VISWANATHAN
[PARTIAL COURT WORKING DAYS BENCH]
For Petitioner(s)  M/S. M R Law Associates, AOR
                   Mr. Balaji Srinivasan, Adv.
                   Mr. Vinod Kanna B, Adv.
                   Mr. Abhilash M.r., Adv.
                   Mr. Sayooj Mohandas, Adv.                   
                   
For Respondent(s)  
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
1.Issue notice, returnable within six weeks.
2.In the meantime, learned counsel for the petitioners may file
additional documents.
3.In the meanwhile, the petitioners shall not be arrested in
pursuance to FIR No. 611 of 2025, registered at Karamana Police
Station, Thiruvananthapuram.
(VARSHA MENDIRATTA)                             (NIDHI MATHUR)
COURT MASTER (SH)                             COURT MASTER (NSH)
